title: I Was Discovered by the Villain - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Romance   Shoujo
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Cross-dressing   Debts   Demons   Empires   European Ambience   Familial Love   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Military   Power Struggle   Reincarnation   Royalty   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Twins
author: Cha Sohee   차소희
description:
I became the subordinate of the villain instead of my younger brother. My goal was to live a quiet life… but…

“If you think of running away, I’ll kill you.” 

“Stay with me till the end. Until I become the Emperor.”

Somehow the villain is obsessed with me. 

Can´t you leave me alone? I want to live quietly!>
